00036 class ChunkBase : public NDimensional<4>, public util::PropertyMap
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039     static const char *neededProperties;
00040     ChunkBase() {}; //do not use this
00041 public:
00042     //  static const dimensions dimension[n_dims]={rowDim,columnDim,sliceDim,timeDim};
00043     typedef isis::util::_internal::ValueReference <ChunkBase > Reference;
00044 
00045     ChunkBase( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps );
00046     virtual ~ChunkBase(); //needed to make it polymorphic
00047 };

00051 template <typename TYPE> class VoxelOp: std::unary_function<bool, TYPE>
00052 {
00053 public:
00054     virtual bool operator()( TYPE &vox, const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> &pos ) = 0;
00055 };

00062 class Chunk : public _internal::ChunkBase, protected ValuePtrReference
00063 {
00064     friend class Image;
00065     friend class std::vector<Chunk>;
00066 protected:
00076     template<typename TYPE, typename D> Chunk( TYPE *src, D d, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00077         _internal::ChunkBase( nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ), ValuePtrReference( ValuePtr<TYPE>( src, getVolume(), d ) ) {}
00078 
00079     Chunk() {}; //do not use this
00080 public:
00081     Chunk( const ValuePtrReference &src, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 );
00082 
00088     template<typename TYPE> TYPE &voxel( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 0, size_t nrOfSlices = 0, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 0 ) {
00089         const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00090         LOG_IF( ! isInRange( idx ), Debug, isis::error )
00091                 << "Index " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( idx ) << " is out of range " << getSizeAsString();
00092         ValuePtr<TYPE> &ret = asValuePtr<TYPE>();
00093         return ret[getLinearIndex( idx )];
00094     }
00095 
00100     template<typename TYPE> const TYPE &voxel( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 0, size_t nrOfSlices = 0, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 0 )const {
00101         const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00102 
00103         if ( !isInRange( idx ) ) {
00104             LOG( Debug, isis::error )
00105                     << "Index " << nrOfColumns << "|" << nrOfRows << "|" << nrOfSlices << "|" << nrOfTimesteps
00106                     << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ")";
00107         }
00108 
00109         const ValuePtr<TYPE> &ret = getValuePtr<TYPE>();
00110 
00111         return ret[getLinearIndex( idx )];
00112     }
00113 
00114     void copySlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const;
00115 
00124     template <typename TYPE> size_t foreachVoxel( VoxelOp<TYPE> &op, util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> offset ) {
00125         const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> imagesize = getSizeAsVector();
00126         util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> pos;
00127         TYPE *vox = &asValuePtr<TYPE>()[0];
00128         size_t ret = 0;
00129 
00130         for( pos[timeDim] = 0; pos[timeDim] < imagesize[timeDim]; pos[timeDim]++ )
00131             for( pos[sliceDim] = 0; pos[sliceDim] < imagesize[sliceDim]; pos[sliceDim]++ )
00132                 for( pos[columnDim] = 0; pos[columnDim] < imagesize[columnDim]; pos[columnDim]++ )
00133                     for( pos[rowDim] = 0; pos[rowDim] < imagesize[rowDim]; pos[rowDim]++ ) {
00134                         if( op( *( vox++ ), pos + offset ) == false )
00135                             ++ret;
00136                     }
00137 
00138         return ret;
00139     }
00140 
00146     template<typename TYPE> size_t foreachVoxel( VoxelOp<TYPE> &op ) {
00147         return foreachVoxel<TYPE>( op, util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>() );
00148     }
00149 
00150     _internal::ValuePtrBase &asValuePtrBase() {return operator*();}
00151     const _internal::ValuePtrBase &getValuePtrBase()const {return operator*();}
00152 
00153     template<typename TYPE> ValuePtr<TYPE> &asValuePtr() {return asValuePtrBase().castToValuePtr<TYPE>();}
00154     template<typename TYPE> const ValuePtr<TYPE> getValuePtr()const {return getValuePtrBase().castToValuePtr<TYPE>();}
00155 
00157     size_t useCount()const;
00158     Chunk cloneToNew( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 )const;
00159 
00165     bool convertToType( short unsigned int ID, scaling_pair scaling = scaling_pair() );
00166 
00167     template<typename T> bool copyToMem( T *dst, size_t len, scaling_pair scaling = scaling_pair() )const {
00168         return getValuePtrBase().copyToMem<T>( dst, len,  scaling ); // use copyToMem of ValuePtrBase
00169     }

00172     scaling_pair getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, autoscaleOption scaleopt = autoscale )const;

00221     bool transformCoords( boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> transform_matrix, bool transformCenterIsImageCenter = false ) {
00222         if( hasProperty( "rowVec" ) && hasProperty( "columnVec" ) && hasProperty( "sliceVec" )
00223             && hasProperty( "voxelSize" ) && hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00224             if( !isis::data::_internal::transformCoords( *this, getSizeAsVector(), transform_matrix, transformCenterIsImageCenter ) ) {
00225                 LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Error during transforming the coords of the chunk.";
00226                 return false;
00227             }
00228 
00229             return true;
00230         }
00231 
00232         return true;
00233     }
00237     void swapAlong( const dimensions dim ) const;

00250 template<typename TYPE> class MemChunk : public Chunk
00251 {
00252 public:
00254     MemChunk( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00255         Chunk( ValuePtrReference( ValuePtr<TYPE>( nrOfColumns *nrOfRows *nrOfSlices *nrOfTimesteps ) ), nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ) {}
00267     template<typename T> MemChunk( const T *const org, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00268         Chunk( ValuePtrReference( ValuePtr<TYPE>( nrOfColumns *nrOfRows *nrOfSlices *nrOfTimesteps ) ), nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ) {
00269         util::checkType<T>();
00270         asValuePtrBase().copyFromMem( org, getVolume() );
00271     }
00273     MemChunk( const Chunk &ref ): Chunk( ref ) {
00274         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00275         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00276     }
00283     MemChunk( const Chunk &ref, const scaling_pair &scaling ): Chunk( ref ) {
00284         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00285         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID, scaling ) );
00286     }
00287     MemChunk( const MemChunk<TYPE> &ref ): Chunk( ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy constructor
00288         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00289         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00290     }
00292     MemChunk &operator=( const Chunk &ref ) {
00293         LOG_IF( useCount() > 1, Debug, warning )
00294                 << "Not overwriting current chunk memory (which is still used by " << useCount() - 1 << " other chunk(s)).";
00295         Chunk::operator=( ref ); //copy the chunk of ref
00296         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00297         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00298         return *this;
00299     }
00301     MemChunk &operator=( const MemChunk<TYPE> &ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy operator
00302         return operator=( static_cast<const Chunk &>( ref ) );
00303     }
00304 };

00307 template<typename TYPE> class MemChunkNonDel : public Chunk
00308 {
00309 public:
00310     //
00312     MemChunkNonDel( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00313         Chunk(
00314             ( TYPE * )calloc( nrOfTimesteps *nrOfSlices *nrOfRows *nrOfColumns, sizeof( TYPE ) ),
00315             typename ValuePtr<TYPE>::NonDeleter(),
00316             nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps
00317         ) {}
00330     template<typename T> MemChunkNonDel( const T *const org, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00331         Chunk(
00332             ( TYPE * )malloc( sizeof( TYPE )*nrOfTimesteps *nrOfSlices *nrOfRows *nrOfColumns ),
00333             typename ValuePtr<TYPE>::NonDeleter(),
00334             nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps
00335         ) {
00336         util::checkType<T>();
00337         asValuePtrBase().copyFromMem( org, getVolume() );
00338     }
00340     MemChunkNonDel( const Chunk &ref ): Chunk( ref ) {
00341         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00342         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00343     }
00351     MemChunkNonDel( const Chunk &ref, const util::_internal::ValueBase &min, const  util::_internal::ValueBase &max ): Chunk( ref ) {
00352         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00353         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID, min, max ) );
00354     }
00355     MemChunkNonDel( const MemChunk<TYPE> &ref ): Chunk( ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy constructor
00356         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00357         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00358     }
00360     MemChunkNonDel &operator=( const Chunk &ref ) {
00361         LOG_IF( useCount() > 1, Debug, warning )
00362                 << "Not overwriting current chunk memory (which is still used by " << useCount() - 1 << " other chunk(s)).";
00363         Chunk::operator=( ref ); //copy the chunk of ref
00364         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00365         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00366         return *this;
00367     }
00369     MemChunkNonDel &operator=( const MemChunkNonDel<TYPE> &ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy operator
00370         return operator=( static_cast<const Chunk &>( ref ) );
00371     }
00372 };
